text:
sorry for the delay with generating the patch -- <@U01JACR6L7L> can you please check the attached file?
it includes quite a few new (partially translated) files thanks to the newly added languages, but hopefully the patch looks OK.
let me know if anything looks odd, or should I make any changes

elements.text: sorry for the delay with generating the patch --

can you please check the attached file?
it includes quite a few new (partially translated) files thanks to the newly added languages, but hopefully the patch looks OK.
let me know if anything looks odd, or should I make any changes

text: for the commit message, you could use the list of related translators from <https://r-contributors.slack.com/archives/C0210D7EN1X/p1680635705463969> :bow:

elements.text: Q1 of 2023 has been also impressively active -- thanks a ton to all the translators for their work (in multiple cases updating several languages)
I'll prepare a patch and share with
